title: The science strands are identified as Nature of Science, Earth and Space Science, Physical Science and Life Science. Although appropriate levels of learning can be adopted for each of these strands, the Pre-Kindergarten Standards have been linked with the Kindergarten Standards and are not meant to limit or exclude children’s exploration or experiences with science concepts that have not been included in this document
